overview: Harking back to the intimacy of his groundbreaking The Adventures of Buttman, John Stagliano presents this collection of world-class gonzo scenes, all broadcast live on his official site, Buttman.com. Clocking in at almost six hours, the scenes are presented "without a net," exactly as shown live on the web. With no editing, you can see the action unfold just as if you were in the room.
title: Buttman's Evil Live
